post:
INXY offers a wide range of CDNs with different options. Find a network that suits your exact project!

We guarantee:

1. Individual approach to every customer.
2. Flexible pricing policy: no overpaying for unnecessary options.
3. Advanced solutions from the most popular companies: Ucdn, CDNNow, EdgeCast, HighWinds, AhCDN.

Servers are located in: Europe, Asia, the USA, Russia and Latin America. It allows covering vast target auditory all around the globe.

**Prices start from as low as $2.5 per 1 Tb and are calculated according to the configuration you need. You can always find an optimal solution for optimal cost.**

Contact us:
Skype inxy.com
Live-chat on our site https://www.inxy.com
